name: The Demon's Exorcism
description:
The Demon's Exorcism is a first-person psychological horror game.

Experience the story of a family trapped in a haunting curse. Immerse yourself in the chilling narrative as you exorcise the demon and break the curse.

Environment

Enter a mansion where chilling events took place. Explore dimly lit hallways and discover the stories hidden in each abandoned room, each space echoing with the memories of the families who once called this place home.

Storyline

This house holds a dark history. Seeking power, a family member awakens a demon and falls into its trap, leading to tragedy and loss of souls. As a player, you will relive parts of this dark past, and each of its fragments will leave you restless and terrified. You may wish to escape, but death won't free you from this place. Will you flee, or will you uncover the truth behind the shadows?

Dark entities

The families who perished in the house will haunt you, leaving you uneasy. They'll shadow your every step, lurk in every corner, toy with your thoughts, and attempt to harm you. Why are they haunting you? What have you done? That's something you'll have to uncover on your own.

Gameplay

In The Demon's Exorcism, you can interact with the environment, and search for things that may help you escape this nightmare or pull you deeper into it.




Death is inevitable in the game. You must defeat the dark entities no matter what. Follow the quests and the storyline to progress in the game.
